input.sentences: i was so nervous before getting married | but i managed to hold on .
when i was saying my bows | i almost forgot them ; i was really exited .
we then went to sign everything to make it all legal .
i am so happy now with my lovely husband .
output.sentences: On the day I got married,  I managed not to feel too nervous.
My brother's sons were are ring bearers and they looked so handsome.
At the part of the ceremony where we were supposed to bow before the minister, we forgot the kneeling bench and our best man quickly exited to grab it for us.
We finally got to the part of the ceremony where we sign the certificate and make it all legal.
At the end of the lovely day, I have my wonderful husband and I am so happy.
